thread.title: Inside Michael Dell’s Sprawling Property Empire

author: WSJ Real Estate
title: Inside Michael Dell’s Sprawling Property Empire
text:
MANSION Train Buffs Are Traveling Cross-Country in Super Luxe Railcars Hitched to Amtrak Trains When John Webb takes his family to California, Washington and Oregon for vacation from his home in Dutchess County, N.Y., they don’t fly or drive. They travel hooked to the back of an Amtrak train in a 1950s-era private railcar that Mr. Webb spent three years and nearly $1 million restoring.
Inside Michael Dell’s Sprawling Property Empire
Known for his lavish spreads in his hometown of Austin, Texas, and on the Big Island of...
